item.title: Veeam Backup for Azure
item.description: Veeam Backup for AZURE - Deployment on Azure (Native Azure Backup - SaaS) Advantages of Veeam Backup for Azure, **Your Azure Backup Infrastructure looks like this, ** **Backup Appliance ** The backup appliance is a Linux-based Azure VM where Veeam Backup for Microsoft Azure is installed. Backup Appliance will run Backup Service, Config. DB, WebUI, Update Service, REST API Service. Backup Repositories A backup repository is a folder in a blob container where Veeam Backup for Microsoft Azure stores backups of Azure VMs Worker Instances
